verbs.description: If [ARG0: North Korea] [V: agrees] [ARG1: to full denuclearization] [ARGM-TMP: when President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un meet in June] , White House National Security Adviser believes the rogue state 's nukes should be dismantled and moved to Tennessee .
